ygData.subject: Re: Leatherskin spell
ygData.msgSnippet: steelskin uses jasper i believe, not sure about diamondskin though...  these spells come in real handy, i always put mine up when i know i m going to take
ygData.messageBody:
steelskin uses jasper i believe, not sure about diamondskin though... these
spells come in real handy, i always put mine up when i know i'm going to
take damage (all out nuking on the tae's in cazic for one)...

Fetko, 31 wiz, Mith Marr

Brad Fetkovich
UIN: 576532

----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 05, 1999 11:06 AM
Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Leatherskin spell


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> in relation, what components are required for the Steelskin and
Diamondskin
> spells? and is it correct that Shieldskin uses Cat's Eye Agate and
> Leatherskin uses Bloodstone? thank you.
>
> Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
> Tyria, Level 10 High Elf Wizard
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
> > From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
> >
> > I wouldnt hunt without it, makes you survive those extra
> > seconds so that the tank can get the MOBs of you!
> >
> >
> > /Askur Wizard of Veeshan
> >
> >
> > > From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
> > >
> > > Recently made level 24 and was wondering whether or not to
> > buy leatherskin
> > > spell. Has anyone else found this spell useful? The
> > bloodstone component is
> > > over 5 gp each, so it can become expensive to use it often.
> > >
> > > Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
> > >
